login.title: Sign in
login.description: Enter your email and password to access your account

signup.title: Create account
signup.description: Enter your email and password to create your account

error.title: Error
error.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

landing.title: TripaliumAI
landing.subtitle: Automate your job search with AI-powered CV generation and smart application matching. Upload your resume, define your criteria, and let us handle the rest.

upload.title: Upload Your CV
upload.description: Upload your existing resume. Our AI extracts and structures your experience, skills, and education.

criteria.title: Define Criteria
criteria.description: Set your target roles, locations, and preferences. We find matching opportunities automatically.

applications.title: Smart Applications
applications.description: AI generates tailored CVs and cover letters. Review and apply with one click.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Your job search at a glance

stats.cvsUploadedEmpty: Upload your first CV to get started
stats.activeCampaignsEmpty: Create a campaign to start finding jobs

pendingReview.title: {count, plural, one {# application} other {# applications}} pending review

error.title: Couldn't load dashboard data
error.description: Please try again or check your connection.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.subtitle: Complete these steps to set up your job search

step1.title: Upload your CV
step1.pending: Upload a PDF resume to extract your profile data

step2.title: Create a campaign
step2.pending: Define your target roles, locations, and preferences

step3.title: Start your campaign
step3.pending: Click "Start" on your campaign to begin finding jobs

recentActivity.title: Recent Activity
recentActivity.subtitle: Your latest actions and updates
recentActivity.empty: No recent activity. Start by uploading your CV.

details.title: Campaign Details
details.description: Give your campaign a name and define the target roles
details.name: Campaign Name

advanced.title: Advanced options

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.description: Set your contract and salary preferences

advanced.contractTypesHint: Leave empty to include all contract types

matching.title: Matching Settings
matching.description: Configure how jobs are matched and processed
matching.thresholdHint: Higher threshold = fewer but more relevant jobs. Lower threshold = more jobs but less relevant. Start with 60% and adjust based on results.
matching.thresholdStrict: Strict - fewer but highly relevant matches.
matching.thresholdRelaxed: Relaxed - more jobs, but less relevant.

automation.autoApplyHint: When enabled, we'll automatically generate application documents for matching jobs. You'll still need to review and approve before anything is sent.
automation.autoApplyDescription: Automatically apply to jobs above threshold (requires review)
automation.practiceModeHint: Perfect for testing! Documents are created but never actually sent to employers. Turn this off when you're ready to apply for real.
automation.practiceModeDescription: Practice mode: documents are generated but never sent to employers

sources.title: Job Sources
sources.description: Select which job boards to search (leave empty for all)

error.title: Error
error.rolesRequired: Please add at least one target role
error.locationsRequired: Please add at least one target location

empty.title: No campaigns yet
empty.description: Create a campaign to define your job search criteria. We'll find matching opportunities and help you apply.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Campaign
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this campaign? This will remove all discovered jobs and applications associated with it. This action cannot be undone.

readyToStart.title: Ready to start?
readyToStart.description: Your campaign won't find jobs until you start it.

jobs.title: Discovered Jobs
jobs.subtitle: Jobs found matching your criteria
jobs.emptyDraft: Start the campaign to discover jobs
jobs.emptyActive: No jobs found yet. Jobs will appear here as they are discovered.

jobRejected.title: Job rejected
jobRejected.description: The job has been marked as not interested.

applications.title: Applications
applications.subtitle: Track and manage your job applications

list.title: All Applications
list.subtitle: Review and manage your job applications

empty.title: No applications yet
empty.description: Start a campaign to discover matching jobs and create applications.

confirmed.title: Application confirmed
confirmed.description: The application is ready to submit.

markedSubmitted.title: Marked as submitted
markedSubmitted.description: The application has been marked as submitted.

empty.title: No CVs uploaded
empty.description: Upload your resume to get started. Our AI will extract your experience, skills, and education automatically.

parsing.analyzing: Analyzing your CV... Usually takes 30-60 seconds.

deleteDialog.title: Delete CV
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this CV? This action cannot be undone.

uploaded.title: CV uploaded
uploaded.description: Your CV is being processed. This may take a moment.

parsed.title: CV parsed successfully
parsed.description: {fileName} has been analyzed and your profile has been updated.

baselineSet.title: Baseline updated
baselineSet.description: This CV is now your baseline resume.

reparseStarted.title: Re-parsing started
reparseStarted.description: The CV is being analyzed again.

error.title: Error
error.uploadFailed: Failed to upload CV. Please try again.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.subtitle: Basic information used in your CV and applications

summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.subtitle: A brief summary of your professional background (2-3 sentences)
summary.placeholder: Experienced software engineer with expertise in full-stack development...

motivation.title: Motivation Text
motivation.subtitle: A generic motivation text used as a base for cover letter generation
motivation.placeholder: I am seeking a challenging role where I can leverage my technical skills while continuing to grow professionally...

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.empty: No work experience added. Upload a CV to extract your experience or add manually.
experience.dialogDescription: Enter the details of your work experience
experience.highlightsPlaceholder:
Led team of 5 engineers
Increased performance by 40%
Implemented CI/CD pipeline

education.title: Education
education.empty: No education added. Upload a CV to extract your education or add manually.
education.dialogDescription: Enter the details of your education

skills.title: Skills
skills.empty: No skills added. Upload a CV to extract your skills or add manually.
skills.dialogDescription: Add a new skill to your profile
skills.name: Skill Name

experienceUpdated.title: Work experience updated
experienceUpdated.description: Your work experience has been saved.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account and application preferences

campaignDefaults.title: Campaign Defaults
campaignDefaults.subtitle: Default settings for new campaigns
campaignDefaults.matchThresholdHint: Minimum match score required for a job to be considered a match
campaignDefaults.practiceModeHint: Practice mode: documents are generated but never sent to employers
campaignDefaults.autoApplyHint: Automatically generate applications for matched jobs
campaignDefaults.remoteJobsHint: Include remote positions in job searches

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Configure how you want to be notified
notifications.jobAlertsHint: Get notified when new matching jobs are found
notifications.applicationUpdatesHint: Get notified about application status changes
notifications.weeklyDigestHint: Receive a weekly summary of your job search activity

passwordUpdated.title: Password updated
passwordUpdated.description: Your password has been changed successfully.

error.title: Error
error.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.subtitle: Manage API keys for programmatic access

info.title: API Access
info.description: Use API keys to access TripaliumAI programmatically. Keys are shown only once when created. Store them securely and never share them publicly.

list.title: Your API Keys
list.count: {count, plural, one {# active key} other {# active keys}}

empty.title: No API keys
empty.description: Create an API key to access TripaliumAI programmatically.

read.label: Read Only
read.description: Can read data but not make changes

createDialog.title: Create API Key
createDialog.description: Create a new API key for programmatic access. The key will only be shown once.
createDialog.name: Name
createDialog.nameHint: A descriptive name to identify this key

keyCreated.title: API Key Created
keyCreated.description: Copy your API key now. You won't be able to see it again.
keyCreated.warning: Make sure to copy your API key now. You won't be able to see it again!

revokeDialog.title: Revoke API Key
revokeDialog.description: Are you sure you want to revoke this API key? This action cannot be undone. Any applications using this key will lose access immediately.

revoked.title: API key revoked
revoked.description: The API key has been permanently revoked.

error.title: Error
error.nameRequired: Please enter a name for the API key

activity.title: Activity
activity.subtitle: View your recent activity and action history

empty.title: No activity yet
empty.description: Your activity will appear here as you use the platform.

metadata.title: TripaliumAI - Job Search Automation
metadata.description: Automate your job search with AI-powered CV generation and applications
